mapper.update: update article set title = #{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, author = #{author,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, user_Id = #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, mender = #{mender,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, type_id = #{typeId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, derivation_Url = #{derivationUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, version = #{version,jdbcType=INTEGER}, is_delete = #{isDelete,jdbcType=INTEGER}, chang_log = #{changLog,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, context = #{context,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select id, title, create_time, update_time, author, user_Id, mender, type_id, derivation_Url, version, is_delete, chang_log, context from article where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
select id, title, create_time, update_time, author, version from article
